meanings.sent1: The opaquenesses of the window prevented us from seeing outside clearly.
meanings.sent2: The opaquenesses of the paint made it impossible to see through.
meanings.sent3: The opaquenesses of the situation left us feeling puzzled.
meanings.sent4: Her opaquenesses were like a thick fog, obscuring any glimpse of the truth.
meanings.sent5: The opaquenesses of the water made it look like a mirror reflecting the sky.

meanings.sent1: The opaquenesses of the glass made it impossible to see through.
meanings.sent2: The opaquenesses of the plastic sheet blocked the light from passing through.
meanings.sent3: The opaquenesses of the excuse were so obvious, it was almost comical.
meanings.sent4: The opaquenesses of the fog enveloped the city in a mysterious shroud.
meanings.sent5: The opaquenesses of the curtains created a cozy, dim atmosphere in the room.

meanings.definition: The state of being difficult to understand or interpret.
meanings.sent1: The opaquenesses of the instructions made it hard to follow.
meanings.sent2: The opaquenesses of her words left us confused about her intentions.
meanings.sent3: The opaquenesses of the joke made it even funnier when we finally got it.
meanings.sent4: The opaquenesses of the concept were like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The opaquenesses of the map made it challenging to navigate through the forest.
